airdropInfo.title: 游꾸 DRIPs Season 2
airdropInfo.description: The second season of points farming is underway - in the protocol they are called DRIPs. RION token TGE has already occurred, DRIPs will be used for user rewards. You earn DRIPs for providing liquidity, participating in ecosystem partner projects Goblin and Moar. There is a referral program.
requirements: Provide liquidity to eligible pools
Trade on Hyperion DEX (earn DRIPs based on fees paid)
Participate in ecosystem partner projects (Goblin, Moar)
Refer friends through referral program
Trade and provide liquidity in APT/RION pools for bonus DRIPs
airdropInfo.additionalInfo: DRIPs are calculated daily and will be used for exclusive incentives and airdrop allocations. Season runs from August 7 - TBD

name: Echelon
description: High-efficiency lending market on Aptos blockchain

airdropInfo.title: 游꾸 Points Program - Season 2
airdropInfo.description: The second season of the points program is underway. The project participates in the Aptos LFM program, which means a token launch in the future. The number of points will influence future protocol rewards.
requirements: Participate in Echelon protocol activities
Earn points through various protocol interactions
Points will influence future token rewards
airdropInfo.additionalInfo: Participates in Aptos LFM (Launch Fund Management) program

name: Meso Finance
description: The capital-efficient Money Market, empowering credit expansion on Aptos

name: Tapp Exchange
description: Tapp Exchange is a next-generation DEX built on Aptos, introducing a modular approach to trading

airdropInfo.title: 游꾸 Tapp Points - Season 2
airdropInfo.description: Tapp Points are awarded for providing liquidity, trading, referrals, and completing social tasks. The second farming season is underway, the token has not been launched yet.
requirements: Provide liquidity: Up to 15 points/day per $100 TVL (10 base + 5 bonus for APT pools)
Trade: 20 points for every $0.01 in trading fees paid
Refer friends: Earn 10% of their points (Tier 1), 6% (Tier 2), 4% (Tier 3)
Complete social tasks: Connect X, Telegram, Discord for one-time bonuses
Participate in weekly quests and milestones
airdropInfo.additionalInfo: Points accrue per second, real-time updates on Rewards page. Multi-level referral system with social bonuses.

name: Auro Finance
description: Auro Finance is an advanced DeFi protocol that enables users to gain rewards and liquidity from their staked APT without any lockups. Through Auro Finance, users can borrow USDA, the platform's native stablecoin, against multiple collateral options, allowing them to utilize their holdings without selling them.

name: Amnis Finance
description: Pioneering Liquid Staking protocol on Aptos

name: Panora
description: An all-in-one trading platform designed to provide users with the best rates and routes for their trades

name: Kofi Finance
description: Kofi introduces MEV boosted liquid staking on Aptos, delivering enhanced yields while maintaining complete liquidity. Stake your APT and receive kAPT & stkAPT - your key to maximized returns.

name: Earnium
description: Earnium is a decentralized exchange (DEX) built on the Aptos blockchain, designed to become the go-to trading hub for the next billion-dollar daily trading volume on Aptos.

airdropInfo.title: 游꾸 Stardust Campaign
airdropInfo.description: The Earnium protocol's Stardust campaign will last until the Earnium Governance Token Airdrop! You earn points for trading, providing liquidity, and regular check-ins on the platform. Currently, you also receive stable token USE for providing liquidity, which is not yet tradable and is planned to be launched before TGE.
requirements: Trade on Earnium DEX
Provide liquidity to pools
Regular check-ins on the platform
Complete daily tasks to accumulate Stardust
Invite friends to earn 5% bonus from their activities
airdropInfo.additionalInfo: Campaign runs until Dec 31, 2024. USE tokens (1 USE = 1 USD) will be converted to EARN tokens at TGE. Note: Yield AI currently doesn't include USE in portfolio calculations.

name: Aave
description: Aave is an Open Source Protocol to create Non-Custodial Liquidity Markets to earn interest on supplying and borrowing assets with a variable or stable interest rate.

name: Moar Market
description: Moar Market is the Credit Layer for Aptos DeFi. It introduces the concept of Composable Leverage - giving you credit to use across DeFi Protocols.

airdropInfo.title: 游꾸 Moarbles Points
airdropInfo.description: Points in Moar are called Moarbles. You earn Moarbles automatically by lending or borrowing on Moar. Lending earns 4x more than borrowing. Moarbles are calculated using time-weighted average balances (TWAB) across the day.
requirements: Lend assets: 4 Moarbles per $100 TWAB/day
Borrow assets: 1 Moarble per $100 TWAB/day
Positions below $100 are not eligible
Frequent rebalancing is accounted for via TWAB calculation
Moarbles accrue automatically - no claiming required
airdropInfo.additionalInfo: Moarbles support leveraged LPs and vault-based strategies. TWAB ensures fair rewards for active rebalancers based on real exposure over time.
